name: Emerge
blurb: Emerge will be THE new iOS game that won't just engage users with captivating gameplay but will also enrapture with stunning graphics.

rewards.reward: Upon Emerge's release in the app store, any backer pledging $5 or more will receive a special link that they can follow on their iOS device that will allow them to change the color of the Emerge ball character.

Upon Emerge's release in the app store, any backer pledging $10 or more will receive a special link that they can follow on their iOS device that will allow them to play as Percel the orange, as seen on the Light Orange Productions logo. Backer will also receive the link to choose a different ball color.
Any backer pledging $15 or more will receive a promo code to download Emerge onto their iOS device for free. Backer will also receive both links as described above.

Any backer pledging $25 or more will receive a t-shirt with the Emerge ball on the front and the Kickstarter "Backer" logo on the back. See the preview in the "Rewards" section of the Emerge project description. Backer will also receive both links as described above.
Any backer pledging $35 or more will receive a 2" diameter blue bouncy ball with the Emerge logo printed on it. Backer will also receive t-shirt and both links as described above.

Any backer pledging $50 or more will receive an 18" x 24" wall poster representing Emerge. You can see what it looks like in the "Rewards" section of the Emerge project description. Backer will also receive t-shirt, bouncy ball, and both links as described above.

Any backer pledging $75 or more will receive a 32-page soft cover booklet, detailing the initial stages of Emerge. Included in the book are multiple 3d object renders, code examples, and general notes and thoughts on the project. I actually created the booklet initially as an assignment associated with the version of Emerge I created in college. Backer will also receive wall poster, t-shirt, and both links as described above.

Upon Emerge's release in the app store, any backer pledging $100 or more will have their name posted at the top of the iTunes app store page for Emerge indicating that they donated $100+. (Name will appear below $250+ and $500+ backers.) Backer will also receive booklet, t-shirt, bouncy ball, wall poster, and both links as described above.

Upon Emerge's release in the app store, any backer pledging $250 or more will have their name posted at the top of the iTunes app store page for Emerge IN BOLD  indicating that they donated $250+. (Name will appear below $500+ backers.) Backer will also receive booklet, t-shirt, bouncy ball, wall poster, and both links as described above.

Upon Emerge's release in the app store any backer pledging $500 or more will have their name posted at the top of the iTunes app store page for Emerge in a special section indicating that they donated $500+, the highest of any other backer. In addition to receiving the booklet, t-shirt, bouncy ball, wall poster, and both links as described above, the booklet and wall poster will be signed by me, Lucas Best.
